    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AppEngine
    The AppEngine class manages the state of a quiz session.
    GameController
    The GameController class acts as the Control Layer of the application.
    IVerificable
    The IVerificable interface defines the contract for validating user responses in quiz questions.
    LectorXML
    The LectorXML class loads quiz questions from XML resources.
    Main
    The dam.primerCurso.ui.Main class is the entry point of the Quiz Application.
    Question
    The Question class represents a single quiz question in the game.
